New-York Historical Society
Richard P. Hart letter to James Crombie
Hart, Richard Philip, 1780-1843
AHMC - Hart, Richard P.
1 letters (in 1 folder).
1842 November 30 Letter from Richard Philip Hart at Troy, New York, to James Crombie, at Fulton, New York, discussing the sale of crops, rental of farmland, the possible acquisition of buildings, and the proposed construction of a dam to provide water power. For fuller details about this item, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
